alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 9:49AM MST until January 31 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills occurring. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Beartooth Foothills, Livingston Area, and Paradise Valley. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until Noon MST today. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 2 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frostbite and hypothermia are possible if precautions are not taken. Blowing snow may cause visibility to drop to a half mile or less at times. Local blizzard conditions are possible. Drifts and icy conditions may develop over area roads including I-90 in the Livingston vicinity.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Paradise Valley
